properties.description: Pipeline to move Artisan Data to the Artisan SQL Server

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	P.PRO_CODE AS profile_code
	,P.PRODESC AS profile_description
	,CONTACT.CONTACT_REF AS oCnta_Det_Ref
	,CONCAT(RTRIM(CONTACT.FORENAMES), RTRIM(CONTACT.SURNAME)) AS FundSourceName	
FROM 
	FUNDSRC_HD AS ACC

	LEFT JOIN PROFILES AS P
		ON P.PRO_REF = ACC.PRO_REF

	LEFT JOIN CONTACT_HD AS CONTACT
		ON CONTACT.CONTACT_REF = ACC.CNTA_DET_REF

	LEFT JOIN CALENDAR_HD AS CALENDAR
		ON CALENDAR.CAL_REF = ACC.CAL_REF
		
	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT AS R
		ON R.RES_REF = ACC.RES_REF
WHERE
	P.FSTYPE = 401
	AND R.STATUS IN (25028, 25029)

properties.description: Downloads data from Broadshields API each evening @ 11:45
Uses the daily Json files from Broadshield API to update the Current table with an Upsert operation. And add new/updated records to the History tables.

activities.name: Update Current data
activities.description: Upserts data from the JSON files to the current tables

activities.name: Create History records
activities.description: Inserts any new or updated records into the history tables.

activities.name: Export billing profiles and Calendars used

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	P.PRO_CODE AS profile_code,
	P.PRODESC AS profile_description,
	CALENDAR.CAL_REF AS Cal_Ref,
	CALENDAR.CAL_CODE AS calendar_code,
	CALENDAR.CAL_DESC AS calendar_description	
FROM 
	FUNDSRC_HD AS ACC

	LEFT JOIN PROFILES AS P
		ON P.PRO_REF = ACC.PRO_REF

	LEFT JOIN CONTACT_HD AS CONTACT
		ON CONTACT.CONTACT_REF = ACC.CNTA_DET_REF

	LEFT JOIN CALENDAR_HD AS CALENDAR
		ON CALENDAR.CAL_REF = ACC.CAL_REF
WHERE
	P.FSTYPE = 401

SELECT 
    Site.SiteId
	,Site.SiteName
	,Profiles.Pro_code AS profile_code
    ,Profiles.Prodesc AS profile_description
    ,Chsysdec.Description AS account_type
    ,Profiles.Pro_ref
    ,Profiles.Billdays AS bill_days_or_nights
    ,Profiles.Billdeath AS bill_day_of_death
    ,Profiles.Billdod AS bill_day_of_discharge
    ,Profiles.Billdoa AS bill_day_of_admission
    ,Profiles.Invprint
    ,Profiles.Invdoc
    ,Profiles.Soflag AS standing_order
    ,Profiles.Noticeper AS notice_period
    ,Profiles.Nperanal AS notice_period_analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Npervatr AS notice_period_vat_code
    ,Profiles.Defrate AS default_charge_rate
    ,Profiles.Chgper AS charge_period
    ,Profiles.Feesanal AS analysis_code
    ,Profiles.Feesdesc AS fees_description
    ,Profiles.FeesVatC AS vat_code
    ,Profiles.BillAbs AS bill_while_temp_absent
    ,Profiles.Autocredit AS automatic_credit
    ,Profiles.PenBooks AS attach_pension_books
    ,Profiles.UserMemo
    ,Profiles.NoInvDec
    ,Profiles.sg_BankAcc
    ,Profiles.UseFlag
    ,Profiles.OOSExtraContrib

FROM 
	Profiles (NOLOCK)

    JOIN Chsysdec (NOLOCK) -- Lookup table for values?
        ON Chsysdec.Decode_Ref = Profiles.FsType

    JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
        ON Site.Site_Ref IN (
                                SELECT Site_Ref
                                FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK)
                                WHERE Site_Join.LinkKey = Profiles.Pro_Ref
                                      AND upper(Site_Join.LinkTable) = 'PROFILES'
                            )
           OR Profiles.SiteFilter = 0
WHERE 
	Profiles.FSTYPE = 401 --Local Auth
	AND Site.SITEID IN (
	071,
072,
073,
074,
075,
078,
079,
086,
089,
088,
091,
092,
090,
095,
096,
097,
098,
099,
100,
101,
102,
103,
104,
105,
106,
107,
108,
109,
110,
111,
112,
113,
114,
115,
116,
117,
118,
119,
120,
121,
122,
123,
127,
128
)

SELECT 
    H.Home_Ref
    --,P.SiteId
    ,SiteName
    ,profile_code
    ,profile_description
    ,account_type
    ,Pro_ref
    ,bill_days_or_nights
    ,bill_day_of_death
    ,bill_day_of_discharge
    ,bill_day_of_admission
    --,Invprint
    --,Invdoc
    ,standing_order
    ,notice_period
    ,notice_period_analysis_code
    ,notice_period_vat_code
    ,default_charge_rate
    ,charge_period
    ,analysis_code
    ,fees_description
    ,vat_code
    ,bill_while_temp_absent
    ,automatic_credit
    ,attach_pension_books
    --,UserMemo
    --,NoInvDec
    ,sg_BankAcc
    --,UseFlag
    --,OOSExtraContrib
FROM 
    dbo.LocalAuthProfiles AS P

    LEFT JOIN ColdHarbourHomeID AS H
        ON H.SITEID = P.SiteId

SELECT DISTINCT
    Site.SiteName
    ,Site.SiteId
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_code AS calendar_code
    ,Calendar_Hd.Cal_desc as calendar_description
    ,DECGrouping.Description AS calendar_grouping
    ,Calendar_Hd.Invdtoff
    ,Calendar_Hd.Invdttype
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldStartDt AS calendar_start_date
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldEndDt AS calendar_end_date
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldFreq AS frequency
    ,Calendar_Hd.BldDays AS no_of_days
    ,Calendar_Hd.ProcFlag
    ,Calendar_Hd.SiteFilter
    ,Calendar_Hd.Sched_Only
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoProc
    ,Calendar_Hd.ProcOffset
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoProcWarn
    ,Calendar_Hd.InvOffset
    ,Calendar_Hd.AutoInvWarn
    ,Calendar_Dt.StartDate AS period_start_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.EndDate AS period_end_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.BillDate AS period_bill_date
    ,Calendar_Dt.SSProcessDate
    ,Calendar_Dt.SSInvoiceDate
FROM 
	Calendar_Hd (NOLOCK)
    
	JOIN ChSysDec AS DECGrouping (NOLOCK)
        ON DECGrouping.Decode_Ref = Calendar_Hd.Grouping
    
	JOIN Calendar_Dt (NOLOCK)
        ON Calendar_Dt.Cal_Ref = Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
    
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
        ON Site.Site_Ref IN (
                                SELECT Site_Ref
                                FROM Site_Join (NOLOCK)
                                WHERE Site_Join.LinkKey = Calendar_Hd.Cal_Ref
                                      AND upper(Site_Join.LinkTable) = 'CALENDAR_HD'
                            )
           OR Calendar_Hd.SiteFilter = 0
WHERE 
	Calendar_Hd.Cal_Code
    BETWEEN '      ' AND 'ZZZZZZ'
    AND Calendar_Dt.StartDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
    AND Calendar_Dt.EndDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
    AND (
            Calendar_Dt.BillDate
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '20991212'
            OR Calendar_Dt.BillDate IS NULL
        )
    AND Site.SITEID IN (
	071,
	072,
	073,
	074,
	075,
	078,
	079,
	086,
	089,
	088,
	091,
	092,
	090,
	095,
	096,
	097,
	098,
	099,
	100,
	101,
	102,
	103,
	104,
	105,
	106,
	107,
	108,
	109,
	110,
	111,
	112,
	113,
	114,
	115,
	116,
	117,
	118,
	119,
	120,
	121,
	122,
	123,
	127,
	128
	)
ORDER BY 
	Calendar_Hd.Cal_code

SELECT 
    H.HOME_REF
    ,SiteName
    --,Cal.SiteId
    ,Cal_Ref
    ,calendar_code
    ,calendar_description
    ,calendar_grouping
    --,Invdtoff
    --,Invdttype
    ,calendar_start_date
    ,calendar_end_date
    ,frequency
    ,no_of_days
    ,ProcFlag
    ,SiteFilter
    ,Sched_Only
    --,AutoProc
    --,ProcOffset
    --,AutoProcWarn
    --,InvOffset
    --,AutoInvWarn
    ,period_start_date
    ,period_end_date
    ,period_bill_date
    ,SSProcessDate
    ,SSInvoiceDate
FROM 
    dbo.Calendars AS Cal

    LEFT JOIN dbo.ColdHarbourHomeID AS H
        ON H.SITEID = Cal.SiteID

Copies the Parquet files from the Azure file share to Azure blob storage. Then copies data from the files and loads into the TRANSFROM_DB

Download bak files from FTP Failure
Transfer File to Blob Storage
activities.description: Copies the file generated on the VM from the file share to container in Blob Storage

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')}))

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(RES_FNAME, 1, CHARINDEX(' ', RES_FNAME + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

properties.description: Copies Homes table from AH1 to AH2 and also updates HomesID's in TRANSFORM_DB Avery.HomeID

activities.name: Update HomeID table

properties.description: Pipeline to update Pricing tables outside GRG refresh Window

activities.name: Upsert Coldharbour Rooms
activities.description: Updates the ColdHarbour.Rooms table from the Polestar DB. Polestar DB is a replication of the GRG database (CH reporting suite/DB)

activities.name: Copy Employee JSON Data to SQL
activities.description: Copies data from the JSON file exported from the API to the Softworks.Employee_JSON table. All stored as String data.

activities.name: Upsert to Tables
activities.description: Upsert data from Softworks.Employee_JSON table to the Softworks.Employee table, converting several of the data types in the process. Uses the EmployeeNumber as the Key Field.

dependsOn.activity: Copy Employee JSON Data to SQL

activities.name: Copy Clockings JSON data to SQL

dependsOn.activity: Copy Clockings JSON data to SQL

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT	 
	'@{variables('Home_Ref')}' AS HOME_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	RESIDENT.RES_CODE as resident_no,
	InvPosting.account_No, 
	InvPosting.Cre_DateT AS created_date, 
	InvPosting.Inv_Date AS transaction_date,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		ELSE ''
	END AS transaction_type,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS transaction_ref1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS transaction_ref2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS transaction_value, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS transaction_balance, 
	Memo,
	USERCOMM AS UserComment
FROM		 
	InvPosting (NOLOCK) 
	
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK) 
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT (NOLOCK)
		ON RESIDENT.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF
WHERE	
	InvPosting.Site_Ref  = '@{variables('SITE_REF')}'
SELECT HOME_REF, HomeName, SITE_REF FROM ColdHarbourHomeID WHERE HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'
